lead_paragraph: Britain's Vodafone has made a formal bid for ONO which will be studied at the cable firm's next board meeting on Febuary 11, newspaper Expansion reported on Saturday.

headline.main: Vodafone to Present Offer for Spain's Ono Next Week-Paper
headline.print_headline: Vodafone to Present Offer for Spain's Ono Next Week-Paper
